Question.Subject: whats with all the penises on chatroulette?
Question.Content: Have you checked out chat roulette? Every other person is a guy masturbating- what the heck is going on??? Don't they have moderators on that site?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Most of the people on that site are either trolls, or exhibitionists (they get off on people watching them do "private" things). It really is NOT a good place to meet people (well, NORMAL people). You have a better chance using Facebook or MySpace.
I'm sure Chatroulette is moderated, but most likely only for content that is actually illegal. Guys jerking off over a webcam, unfortunately, is not a crime. Unless it's being shown to minors.
